page.title: 20Cornwood's oldest inhabitant
page.content: Beatrice Haynes,91,Cornwood's oldest inhabitant,lives alone,a widow of 23 yrs.Looking back,she remembers the village brass band;visitors from Ply- mouth arriving at Cornwood station and walking to local beauty spots;her father breaking stones to make roads and her brother-in-law,who was the village bootmaker.She says"life is better today...in some ways" We have carpet on the floor instead of sacks; water indoors and not down a well.When 'in service'she worked from 7am.-9pm. and then ended her day huddled by the fire. Now she enjoys local radio and TV. and electricity has made life much easier. COMPILED BY:3rd & 4th yrs. Stowford Sch.;Ms P.den Hollander;Mr P.Rosser. Contributions:K.Nightingale;M.Honnor; J.Dennis;E.Pearse. Photos:D.N.Taylor;P.den Hollander.
